aboutpara: Currently pursuing my studies in data science, I am actively seeking opportunities to apply my skills as a data scientist in a professional setting. With multiple years of experience working as a student at two renowned German companies - Mercedes-Benz and Siemens, I have honed my ability to tackle real-world challenges and deliver data-driven solutions. My academic journey has equipped me with a solid foundation in data science, and I am eager to dive deeper into the field by implementing theoretical knowledge into practical applications.
aboutpara2: I am currently writing my master's thesis in the exciting domain of generative AI, where I am developing graph-based machine learning algorithms to solve complex problems. Committed to continuous learning and growth, I am determined to make a meaningful impact in the data science industry. I thrive in collaborative environments and am always excited to explore new technologies, methodologies, and innovative approaches to data analysis. Let's connect and create data-driven solutions that drive success!
